Certificate of Advanced Graduate Study i: Certificate of Advanced Graduate Study in Finance Certificate of Advanced Graduate Study (Post-MBA CAGS) Overview Completion of a Certificate of Advanced Graduate Study (CAGS) will afford Rowan MBA alumni as well as MBA graduates of other AACSB accredited universities the opportunity to complete an area of concentration or complete a new concentration. The Post MBA CAGS provides MBA graduates an opportunity to prepare themselves for opportunities in a rapidly changing workplace by enrolling in concentrations related to their current or expected career paths.
